CustomField.description: CR000475: Auto-derived from Win Reason or Loss Reason. Indicates whether the win or loss is Controllable, Partially Controllable, or Uncontrollable by the organization.
CustomField.formula:
IF(OR( ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "High-Quality, Well Structured Data"), ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "Data Structure and User Interface"), ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "No Code Analytics"), ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "Powerful Visualization and Charting"), ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "Operational Efficiency and Workflow Improvement"), ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "AI-Enabled Productivity or Insight"), ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "Collaboration, Sharing and Access Model"), ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "Compelling Value for Price"), ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "Adopted as a Core Team Platform"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Platform Usability or Data Structure Limitations"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Visualization or Analytical Capabilities Insufficient"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "AI Capabilities Did Not Meet Expectations"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Insufficient Business Value Relative to Cost"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "License Consolidation or Reduction"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Disqualified - No Valid Opportunity") ), "Controllable",
IF(OR( ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "Broad and Deep Data Coverage"), ISPICKVAL(Win_Reason__c, "Integration with Existing Tools and Workflows"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Data Coverage Did Not Meet Requirements"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Integration Constraints to other Tools"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "IT Environment Constraints"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Budget or Pricing Constraints"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Competitive Solution Selected"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Internal/Build Solution Preferred"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Legal or Compliance Restrictions"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Contract Terms not Agreed") ), "Partially Controllable",
IF(OR( ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Change in Scope or Priorities"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Organizational Change/User Transfer"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Existing License Coverage") ), "Uncontrollable",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Pipeline Clean Up"), "Admin",
NULL))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto-populated based on the selected Win or Loss Reason. Classifies whether the outcome was Controllable, Partially Controllable, or Uncontrollable.
CustomField.label: Control Level
